text: Robert Axelrod (May 29, 1949 â€“ September 7, 2019), also credited as Axel Roberts and Myron Mensah, was an American actor. He was known for his voice work in Digimon. He was also the voice of Lord Zedd, the main antagonist of the Mighty Morphin Power Rangers; and Finster, the original Mighty Morphin Power Rangers monster maker. He also played a Paul McCartney look-alike on the popular sitcom Family Matters. Axelrod died in Los Angeles, California on September 7, 2019 at the age of 70. He had been suffering from problems caused by spinal surgery. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1949 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Robert Axelrod (actor)
